description: The heavy lifting is done in the background. The system is designed to be as simple as possible, but not compromising on any of the features. Easy to translate web content, web pages.
Bhashini Web Translation Plugin provides many plug-and-play features that are ready to execute your translation tasks using any of the available models.

Our plugin seamlessly integrates into your existing workflow, eliminating the need for complex setup or extensive training. Simply add the plugin, and you're ready to start translating content with ease.
